item.title: 'Horror' in Gaza is 'incomprehensible,' says US doctor who treated patients there
item.description: Dr. Aqsa Durrani, an American physician with 15 years of humanitarian aid experience, said her colleagues in Gaza are working in conditions that are "...

item.title: Russia hits Ukraine with 'massive' drone, missile attack, Kyiv says
item.description: Russia launched 614 air attack munitions into Ukraine overnight into Thursday, the air force in Kyiv said, in a "massive combined air strike" on targe...

item.title: Man accused of dragging state trooper, triggering manhunt arrested: Police
item.description: A Vermont man accused of leading Massachusetts police on a high-speed chase and dragging a state trooper was taken into custody, police said.

item.title: WATCH: McDonald's cuts costs of some popular items
item.description: The fast food giant is lowering the prices of its combo meals weeks after the CEO acknowledged that its menu had become too costly.

item.title: WATCH: Michael Urie and Kumail Nanjiani talk 'Oh, Mary!'
item.description: The actors share a story about a famous face in the audience of their Broadway show.
